Author: Abraham Lincoln
Quote: You cannot escape the responsibility of tomorrow by evading it today.

Author: Alexis Carrel
Quote: Man cannot remake himself without suffering, for he is both the marble and the sculptor.

Author: Andrew Carnegie
Quote: The man who acquires the ability to take full possession of his own mind may take possession of anything else to which he is justly entitled.

Author: Batman
Quote: I have one power. I never give up.

Author: Batman
Quote: Why do we fall? So that we can learn to pick ourselves back up.

Author: Batman
Quote: It's not who I am underneath, but what I do that defines me.

Author: Batman
Quote: But if I do that, if I allow myself to go down into that place... I'll never come back.

Author: Bruce Lee
Quote: Do not pray for an easy life. Pray for the strength to endure a difficult one.

Author: Conor McGregor
Quote: Doubt is only removed by action. If you're not working then that's where doubt comes in.

Author: Conor McGregor
Quote: All that matters is how you see yourself.

Author: Conor McGregor
Quote: The thing about the truth is, not a lot of people can handle it.

Author: Conor McGregor
Quote: Life is about growing and improving and getting better.

Author: Conor McGregor
Quote: The more you seek the uncomfortable the more you will become comfortable.

Author: Conor McGregor
Quote: What defines us is how well we rise after falling.

Author: Conor McGregor
Quote: Real champions fight through adversity.

Author: Edwin Louis Cole
Quote: Being a male is a matter of birth. Being a man is a matter of choice.

Author: Elon Musk
Quote: Persistence is very important. You should not give up unless you are forced to give up.

Author: Elon Musk
Quote: I think it is possible for ordinary people to choose to be extraordinary.

Author: Elon Musk
Quote: If humanity doesn't land on Mars in my lifetime, I would be very disappointed.

Author: Elon Musk
Quote: Why do you want to live? What's the point? What inspires you? What do you love about the future?

Author: Friedrich Nietzsche
Quote: When we are tired, we are attacked by ideas we conquered long ago.

Author: Friedrich Nietzsche
Quote: Invisible threads are the strongest ties.

Author: Friedrich Nietzsche
Quote: The lonely one offers his hand too quickly to whomever he encounters.

Author: Friedrich Nietzsche
Quote: There is not enough love and goodness in the world to permit giving any of it away to imaginary beings.

Author: Friedrich Nietzsche
Quote: To live is to suffer, to survive is to find some meaning in the suffering.

Author: Friedrich Nietzsche
Quote: Today as always, men fall into two groups: slaves and free men.

Author: Friedrich Nietzsche
Quote: I hate who steals my solitude, without really offer me in exchange company.

Author: Hemingway
Quote: True nobility is being superior to your former self.

Author: Henry Ford
Quote: My best friend is the one who brings out the best in me.

Author: Isaiah 54:17
Quote: No weapon formed against you shall prosper.

Author: James Bond
Quote: Bond. James Bond.

Author: Jean Paul Sartre
Quote: Man is nothing else, but what he makes of himself.

Author: Jocko Willink
Quote: All excuses are lie

Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
Quote: One cannot always be a hero, but one can always be a man.

Author: Jordan Peterson
Quote: The masculine spirit is under assault. It's obvious.

Author: Jordan Peterson
Quote: Once someone has spent enough time cultivating bad habits and biding their time, they are much diminished. Much of what they could have been has dissipated.

Author: Jordan Peterson
Quote: Can you imagine yourself in 10 years if, instead of avoiding the things you know you should do, you actually did them every single day?

Author: Jordan Peterson
Quote: The successful among us delay gratification. The successful among us bargain with the future.

Author: Jordan Peterson
Quote: Don't compare yourself with other people; compare yourself with who you were yesterday.

Author: Jordan Peterson
Quote: To suffer terribly and to know yourself as the cause: that is Hell.

Author: Jordan Peterson
Quote: Dare to be dangerous.

Author: Jordan Peterson
Quote: Accept the terrible responsibility of life with eyes wide open.

Author: Jordan Peterson
Quote: It's very difficult to regulate yourself, and if you learn to do that, well, it starts to spill over.

Author: Jordan Peterson
Quote: Don't compare yourself with other people; compare yourself with who you were yesterday.

Author: Jordan Peterson
Quote: Define who you are. Refine your personality. Choose your destination and articulate your Being.

Author: Jordan Peterson
Quote: You're going to pay a price for every bloody thing you do and everything you don't do.

Author: Jordan Peterson
Quote: Happiness is a pointless goal.

Author: Jordan Peterson
Quote: Quit drooping and hunching around. Walk tall and gaze forthrightly ahead.

Author: Lord Baelish
Quote: It doesn't matter what we want. Once we get it, then we want something else.

Author: Lord of the Rings
Quote: 'Precious, precious, precious!' Gollum cried. 'My Precious! O my Precious!'

Author: Marcus Aurelius
Quote: Do every act of your life as though it were the very last act of your life.

Author: Marcus Aurelius
Quote: You have power over your mind — not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.

Author: Marcus Aurelius
Quote: If it is not right do not do it.

Author: Marcus Aurelius
Quote: You have power over your mind – not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.

Author: Marcus Aurelius
Quote: If it's endurable, then endure it.

Author: Marcus Aurelius
Quote: Because a thing seems difficult for you, do not think it impossible.

Author: Marcus Aurelius
Quote: Let men see, let them know, a real man, who lives as he was meant to live.

Author: Martin Luther King Jr.
Quote: The ultimate measure of a man is not where he stands in moments of comfort and convenience, but where he stands at times of challenge and controversy.

Author: Max Landis
Quote: What's special about Superman is that he will always make the right choice.

Author: Patrick Henry
Quote: Adversity toughens manhood, and the characteristic of the good or the great man is not that he has been exempt from the evils of life, but that he has surmounted them.

Author: Ramsay Bolton
Quote: If you think this has a happy ending you haven't been paying attention.

Author: Robert Bolt
Quote: A man should go where he won't be tempted.

Author: Robert Jordan
Quote: There is one rule, above all others, for being a man. Whatever comes, face it on your feet.

Author: Samwise Gamgee
Quote: Wake up, Mr. Frodo!

Author: Seneca
Quote: No man is more unhappy than he who never faces adversity. For he is not permitted to prove himself.

Author: Seneca
Quote: All cruelty spawns from weakness.

Author: Sigmund Freud
Quote: One day, in retrospect, the years of struggle will strike you as the most beautiful.

Author: Spiderman
Quote: With great power comes great responsibility.

Author: Superman
Quote: Dreams save us.

Author: Superman
Quote: You're much stronger than you think you are.

Author: Superman
Quote: It doesn't take X-Ray vision to see you are up to no good.

Author: Tyler Durden
Quote: Without pain, without sacrifice we would have nothing. Like the first monkey shot into space.

Author: Tyler Durden
Quote: This is your life and its ending one moment at a time.

Author: Victor Frankl
Quote: When men cannot find a deep sense of meaning, they distract themselves with pleasure.

Author: Vito Corleone
Quote: I spent my life trying not to be careless. Women and children can be careless, but not men.

Author: Washington
Quote: Human happiness and moral duty are inseparably connected.

Author: Yukio Mishima
Quote: The special quality of hell is to see everything clearly down to the last detail.
